title: League won't launch
body: I have a Mac OS X and league wouldn't launch on my regular client, so I reinstalled it and the client won't update... It says it is updating my client and then the launch button appears, but I push it and nothing happens. The logo doesn't change and the Client doesn't open. I have been trying to fix it for the past 3 days and nothing has worked. If a Riot Employee comes across this, PLEASE HELP MEEEEEE

replies.body:
I've seen a number of our Mac players that have been having this issue, and while it seems like some kind of weird permissions issue, some players have been able to get around this by manually updating their OS. 

Check out [**this link**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1), and see if forcing that update through helps out. Hit me back and let me know if that helps!!
Some players can't manually update to macOS sierra because you need a later mac (the latest the update can go is 2009) like if you have a 2007 mac like I do it dosen't work so :(

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cVzwK3EI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-20T23:48:50.486+0000)
>
> I've seen a number of our Mac players that have been having this issue, and while it seems like some kind of weird permissions issue, some players have been able to get around this by manually updating their OS. 
> 
> Check out [**this link**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&amp;ls=1), and see if forcing that update through helps out. Hit me back and let me know if that helps!!

Hoping all the info you and Porocles have been transferring to your tech guys bring about some results to solve this Mac issue!

We're doing all we can, that's for sure! Trust me when I say, Porocles and I are just as frustrated as you all must be. We're working as best we can to figure this issue out, and it'll be much easier with feedback on what's worked and what hasn't!

i tryed patching, reinstal, hextec tools and nothing change the problem. i notice something: 

when patcher was active, i lock it in the quicklaunch pad 
when i try to launch it directly (not with the launcher icon) it crash and show a bugsplat thing so i send you a report via bugslpat..... i hope this could help...
thank you, Broporo, but my mac can't go past 10.8.5 at the moment :/
